bibl.title: Variation in Complementation to Impersonal verba declarandi in Greek Papyri from the Roman and Byzantine Periods.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Impersonal δηλοῦται [Nos 1-5]. - 3. Impersonal δῆλον [Nos 6-16]. - 4. Conclusions.

Trevor V. EVANS and Dirk D. OBBINK (Edd.), The Language of the Papyri (Oxford, 2010) pp. 140-155, 1 tabl.
